channel.title: Vitality Records Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the Vitality Records podcast! A weekly podcast featuring ~30 minutes of the best drum & bass releases from us and others!
channel.copyright: All rights belong to their respective owners.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the Vitality Records podcast! A weekly podcast featuring ~30 minutes of the best drum & bass releases from us and others!
channel.itunes:author: Vitality Records
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the Vitality Records podcast! A weekly podcast featuring ~30 minutes of the best drum & bass releases from us and others!

item.title: Vitality Podcast - EP:05
item.itunes:author: Vitality Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Vitality Podcast - EP:05
item.description:
Welcome to this week's episode of the Vitality Records Podcast!
-Tracklist-
1. Drifta - Fake It (Salaryman Remix) [Saucy Vibes] 2. Segment & Concept Vision - Charge [EatBrain] 3. Bungle - Enclosure [Soul Trader Records] 4. MissioN - Launch (Endbite Remix) [MissioN] 5. 64:INIT - calmchaos_dnb_testver2 (Coming soon to the "untitled_1" LP!) [Vitality Records] 6. Maduk - Got Me Thinking (feat. Veela) [Hospital Records] 7. Noisia & Black Sun Empire - Hideous [BSE Recordings]
Thank you for tuning in to this week's podcast! See you next time!

item.description:

-Tracklist-

Thank you for tuning in to this week's podcast! See you next time!

item.title: Vitality Podcast - EP:03
item.itunes:author: Vitality Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Vitality Podcast - EP:03
item.description:
Welcome to this week's episode of the Vitality Records Podcast!
-Tracklist-
1. AVA - Soundboy [Coming Soon to Vitality Records!] 2. Posij - Hunger [MTA Records] 3. Mean Teath - Transfixed [Santoku Records] 4. Audiobot - Flavor [Audiobot / AIA] 5. The Upbeats - The Furies [Drum & Bass Arena] 6. Alex Perex & Ivy Lab - No One Else [Critical Records] 7. The Vanguard Project - Rhode House [Spearhead Records]
Thank you for tuning in to this week's podcast! See you next time!

item.title: Vitality Podcast - EP:02
item.itunes:author: Vitality Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Vitality Podcast - EP:02
item.description:
Welcome to this week's episode of the Vitality Records podcast!
-Tracklist- 1. Code 23 - Girls [UKF] 2. GLXY - Lonely [Soulvent Records] 3. 1991 - Sprites [MTA Records] 4. AVA - ??? [Vitality Records] 5. B. Aperio - Reflections [Liquid Tones] 6. S.P.Y. - Bass Terror [Hospital Records] 7. GLXY - Midnight [Free Download] 8. Logistics - Jungle Music [Hospital Records] 9. Rameses B - Dream Catcher (feat. Charlotte Haining) [Monstercat]
Thanks for tuning in to this week's podcast! See you again soon!

item.title: Vitality Podcast - EP:01
item.itunes:author: Vitality Records
item.itunes:subtitle: Vitality Podcast - EP:01
item.description:
Welcome to the Vitality Records Podcast!
-Tracklist-
1. AVA - Serene [Vitality Records] 2. Deccies - Morph [Deccies] 3. The Prototypes - Pop It Off (feat. Mad Hed City) [Viper Recordings] 4. AVA - Everlasting [Vitality Records] 5. Ownglow - All Black [Hospital Records] 6. AVA - Existential [AVA] 7. Botnek & I See Monstas - Deeper Love [Monstercat]
Thanks for tuning in to this week's podcast! See you next week!
